text: Plaza Suite is a 1971 American comedy movie directed by Arthur Hiller and was based on the 1968 play of the same name by Neil Simon. It stars Walter Matthau, Maureen Stapleton, Barbara Harris, Lee Grant, Jenny Sullivan and was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * Category:1971 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Arthur Hiller
title: Plaza Suite
